p: At all tested concentrations, wells treated with methanol extract exhibited low absorbance values (low cell survival) compared to the dichloromethane: methanol (1:1) extract. The analysis of variance was done using a one way ANOVA at a P value of <0.05 and the means were found to be significantly different with a P < 0.0001. Percentage inhibition of cell growth by the two extracts was determined from respective absorbance values at all concentrations ( TableÂ 2).
